thread.title: BRIEF-Fitch Affirms Argentina At 'B'; Revises Outlook To Stable

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fitch Affirms Argentina At 'B'; Revises Outlook To Stable
text:
May 4 (Reuters) - Fitch Ratings:
* FITCH AFFIRMS ARGENTINA AT ‘B’; REVISES OUTLOOK TO STABLE
* FITCH ON ARGENTINA SAYS REVISED OUTLOOK TO STABLE FROM POSITIVE
* FITCH SAYS REVISION OF ARGENTINA’S OUTLOOK REFLECTS MACROECONOMIC POLICY FRICTIONS, POLITICAL HEADWINDS THAT HAVE INTENSIFIED BEYOND FITCH’S PRIOR EXPECTATIONS
* FITCH SAYS ARGENTINA’S RATING REFLECTS HIGH INFLATION & ECONOMIC VOLATILITY, A WEAK ALBEIT IMPROVED EXTERNAL LIQUIDITY POSITION, AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon:
